ch.epfl.lis.wingj

Class WJFolderOpener

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.lis.wingj.WJFolderOpener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ij.plugin.PlugIn

    public class WJFolderOpener
extends java.lang.Object
implements ij.plugin.PlugIn
    Modified version of ij.plugin.FolderOpener to access important variables.

    That would have been nice to have used protected variables in ij.plugin.FolderOpener. ;)

    Version:
    December 4, 2012
    Author:
    Thomas Schaffter (thomas.schaff...@gmail.com)
